price: “Kandi ko iyo (abahakanyi) baza kuyoboka inzira igororotse (bakayishikamamo), rwose twari kubaha amazi (imvura) menshi (kandi y’umugisha)”,
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
